pages.title: Identify close contacts of bird flu

components.name: ooHdDj
components.content: You can use this service if we sent an email or text asking you to complete this form. You can do this for yourself or for someone else.

components.name: tKEFcw
components.content: Use this service to report:

components.name: QlWuFo
components.content: It should take about 10 minutes to complete.

components.name: ifAKep
components.content: Before you start

components.name: VCwJTN
components.content: We will need some details of the people that you will list in this form. These details include:

components.name: Qkjtcn
components.content: You will need the details of the close contacts ready.

components.name: TqEyQM
components.content: The information you give will be handled in strict confidence and will only be kept and used in line with data protection laws.

components.name: gfOVOL
components.content: If you need help completing this form

components.name: jmslVl
components.content: If you need help to complete this form, contact 111 for help.

components.content: ! Note If you are the parent, guardian or carer of this person, put down your contact details below.

pages.title: Who should we contact if we need to follow up?

components.name: who_should_we_contact
components.title: Who we should follow up with
components.hint: Select 'Me' if you are the parent, guardian or carer of the other person

components.name: JJOVvQ
components.content: If you select 'Them' we may still contact you if we are unable to get a hold of them.

pages.title: Have they been in close contact with anyone in the last 7 days?

components.name: EiNVay
components.content: A close contact is anyone they've been near long enough to risk spreading the virus. This includes:

components.name: Subheader
components.content: Personal details

components.name: Subheader
components.content: Contact details

components.name: ContactWarningText
components.content: ! Note If this person is under 18, put down the contact detail of their parent or legal guardian.

components.name: ContactHintText
components.content: Please provide at least one contact detail for the close contact.

components.name: ContactPara
components.content: You can add more close contacts after you contact.

components.name: ValidationScript
components.content: <script>document.querySelector("form[enctype='multipart/form-data']").addEventListener("submit",function(e){if(document.getElementById("contact_phone_number").value===""&&document.getElementById("contact_email").value===""){e.preventDefault();document.getElementById("at-least-one").className="govuk-error-message";document.getElementById("at-least-one").setAttribute("role","alert");}});</script>
